DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine VI-0521 affect speed reaction time specific task require eye hand coordination , compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate How VI-0521 Affect Psychomotor Performance Healthy Overweight Obese Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Written consent ; Adequate contraception screen 28 day last dose study drug female subject ; Healthy obese overweight subject BMI 27 35 . History glaucoma past present use medication treat increase intraocular pressure ; Current use tobacco product , include cigarette , cigar , pipe , chew tobacco , use within three month prior screen ; History drug abuse three year prior screen ; History alcohol abuse , excessive alcohol consumption , describe nonusers alcohol ; Current depression moderate great severity , presence history suicidal behavior active suicidal ideation More one lifetime episode major depression ; Currently work night shift job ; On average consumes great two cup coffee xanthinecontaining beverage per day ( > 200 mg/day ) within two week prior screen ; Any use dietary , herbal , and/or fitness/bodybuilding supplement ( exception vitamin ) within one month prior screen ; Aspartate aminotransferase alanine aminotransferase > 2.5 x ULN ; Serum creatinine ≥1.5 mg/dL men ≥1.4 mg/dL woman .
